creditline: Gift of Ruth and Bruce Dayton
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: slightly waisted two (?) part secondary molded gourd with a slightly pointed bottom, used as a cricket carrier or cage; the bulging lid with a phoenix and plum blossom design is made of ivory, as is the lip of the lid and rim of the gourd; the body of the gourd is decorated all over with a foliate design
markings: [1196-17], on sticker, inside rim of gourd
title: Winter Cricket Cage
